name: Tutorial files for ASESMA 2016
body:
This site hosts the files that are used for the tutorials.

### Monday, June 13
- The shell tutorial can be found here: http://swcarpentry.github.io/shell-novice/

### Tuesday, June 14
- Quantum Espresso, SCF: [Day2.tar](Day2.tar)

### Wednesday
- Quantum Espresso: [wednesday_tut.tar.gz](wednesday_tut.tar.gz)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
